resources.string:
You will be presented with sets of 3 numbers.

 Pick largest, smallest and middle numbers, and you will achieve star level.

 You receive 1 point for a correct, and -2 points for incorrect answers.

See how quickly you can achieve star level by receive 20 points.
Enter 3 numbers, and the system will tell you which one is largest.

This is a game based on a classic "pick the largest" of three numbers.

 You will be presented with 3 numbers, and you will be required to pick the largest.

 Scoring is a function of time and if you select the correct answer.

There are 5 sets of numbers for each game. A perfect score for a game is 500 points.

For each set, you can obtain 100 points. The longer you delay answering, the fewer points you will receive.

For example, if you answer correct after 1 second, you will receive 90 points instead of 100. 

If you answer incorrect, after 1 second, your score will be reduced by 1/2 the correct score, or -45.
